about_the_game:
This Emerald Elegance Pack includes 11 furniture items, 17 clothing items, 4 wigs, 1 mount, and 2 pets.

If green is your favorite color, then this is the pack for you! The Emerald Elegance Pack has 35 regal emerald outfits and furniture items available for you to customize your characters and decorate your homes, sheds, and farms.

Pack includes:
  • Elegant Emerald Furniture Set: Elegant Emerald Bed, Elegant Emerald Chair, Elegant Emerald Cushion, Elegant Emerald End Table, Elegant Emerald Vase, Elegant Emerald Torch, Elegant Emerald Lamp, Elegant Emerald Couch, Elegant Emerald Table, Elegant Emerald Leaf Rug, and Elegant Emerald Glowing Plant
  • Elegant Emerald Outfit Set: Elegant Emerald Helm, Elegant Emerald Tunic, Elegant Emerald Pants, and Elegant Emerald Armored Gloves
  • Emerald Otter Outfit Set: Emerald Otter Mask, Emerald Robe, and Emerald Otter Boots
  • Emerald Bounty Hunter Outfit Set: Emerald Bounty Hunter Wig, Emerald Bounty Hunter Armor, Emerald Bounty Hunter Gloves, and Emerald Bounty Hunter Pants
  • Emerald Earth Mage Outfit Set: Emerald Earth Mage Wig, Emerald Earth Mage Dress, and Emerald Earth Mage Gloves
  • Emerald Edgy Outfit Set: Emerald Edgy Wig, Emerald Edgy Robe, Emerald Edgy Gloves, and Emerald Edgy Pants
  • Elegant Queen Outfit Set: Elegant Queen Wig, Elegant Queen Dress, and Elegant Queen Gloves
  • Emerald Otter Mount
  • Bertie, the Emerald Weasel Pet
  • Fozzy, the Otter Pet
